scripts.package-linux: electron-packager . INNERFACE --platform=linux --arch=arm64 --out=dist --overwrite && copy setup.sh dist\INNERFACE-linux-arm64\setup.sh && copy start.sh dist\INNERFACE-linux-arm64\start.sh && copy package.json dist\INNERFACE-linux-arm64\package.json && copy controller.py dist\INNERFACE-linux-arm64\controller.py
